Hello,
I am Ahmed Nasr, from Gaza, Palestine.
I am applying to seek support.
My reasons to request support:
1.We " 5 members group: a nurse who is me, three teachers – two of them is my sisters, and an engineer who is my brother" are planning to set up a kindergarten in our neighborhood because of the lack of kindergartens and the large number of children who could not register in any kindergarten due to the lack of unoccupied  places or due to high registration fees which are up to 500 shekels, equivalent to $ 130, with no bus transportation, and up to 900 shekels or $ 240 with the bus fees.
We are looking for establishing the kindergarten on a part of land near our house its space about 250 square meters in addition to a ground floor in our house. Kindergarten will be consist of 4 classes, management room, canteen, 2 bathrooms, Games room and reception room with a square to play and garage for the bus.
2.We will be supportive for children who can not find places or do not have money to register.
Our goal is to create an atmosphere of peaceful coexistence through education, play and the arts.
We do not belong to a particular organization but we are a group of young ambitious youth with goal to work and work on the education of children in the Gaza Strip to coexist peacefully and erase the memory of the war that they live it.
The work we will do:
1. We will support the children psychologically and teach them the principles to live in peace.
2. We seek to rehabilitate children by educational and creative work.
3. We are looking for help needy children by registering them in the kindergarten to receive their right of education.
4. We seek to make fun character on the face of the children in Gaza.
And we assure that we are committed to providing all of the child protection and we adhere to the child protection policy.
At the end, we thank you very much.   >>>>>  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/establishing-a-kindergarten-in-gaza-strip/x/12076674#/story
we need your help urgently to attract donors, please!
EM THIS WHITE NIGGER INT STOPING THIS MOTHER fucker
